docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: HALF of the students in the classrooms of Andrew Frank, professor of mechanical engineering at the University of California at Davis, are foreigners. Sixty of the 400 scientists employed by the Pittsburgh-based Rockwell International Corporation are foreign.

byline.original: By STEVEN SOLOMON; Steven Solomon is the author of ''Small Business U.S.A.''

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: In a sunny corner of a day-care center, the teachers gathered the children together, made sure everyone had a lap to sit on and told them that Carlos had died. The boys and girls looked at pictures of their 2-year-old classmate, talked of how they would miss him and asked whether the same thing would happen to them.

headline.main: The Most Tragic Victims of AIDS: Thousands of Youngsters
